WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string from @Botfather.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from or https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Get this value from or https://my.telegram.org

AUTH_USERS.description: Your telegram I'd use this bot @UploadLinkToFileBot and use /info

BANNED_USERS.description: Type the user id to be banned

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: For Force Subscribe. Paste your Update channel USERNAME (without @)..

DEF_THUMB_NAIL_VID_S.description: default thumbnail to be used in the videos. Incase, youtube-dl is unable to find a thumbnail.

CHUNK_SIZE.description: chunk size that should be used with requests

HTTP_PROXY.description: proxy for accessing youtube-dl in GeoRestricted Areas. Get your own proxy from https://github.com/rg3/youtube-dl/issues/1091#issuecomment-230163061
